title: BEN Drowned
itunes:title: BEN Drowned
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
There's a strong draw to the nostalgia of old video games. But some games are nothing to play with. Jadusable learned this lesson the hard way and documented the downward spiral that followed his finding a strange copy of the Nintendo classic game "Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask"

***

Support this podcast and get rewards at Patreon.com/Creepypod

***

Sound Design by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
